attributes.action: end the unfairness of MPs not in English constituencies being able to vote on issues only affecting England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There has been devolution for Northern Ireland, Scotland and Wales, who now have a degree of autonomy on how they run their own countries.  It therefore seems anomalous that England is not afforded the same autonomy.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
